exceptions.exn: In environment k, p, q, g, l, u : nat H : k * p <= q H0 : p = u * g H1 : is_gcd p q g H2 : is_lcm p q l H3 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> p div l - u * p Unable to unify "exists p : nat, ?M1526 - ?M1527 * ?M1523 = p * ?M1523" with "p div l - k * u * p /\\ q - k * p div l - k * u * p /\\ (forall k0 : nat, p div k0 -> q - k * p div k0 -> l - k * u * p div k0)".

In environment H3 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - p) (l - u * p) k, g, u, x : nat H : k * (u * g) <= x * g H5 : forall k : nat, k div u * g -> k div x * g -> k div g x0 : nat H1 : u * g = x0 * g x1 : nat H6 : forall k : nat, u * g div k -> x * g div k -> x1 * (x * g) div k x2 : nat H2 : x1 * (x * g) = x2 * (u * g) Unable to unify "?M5782 * ?M5784 <= ?M5783 * ?M5785" with "exists p : nat, x1 * (x * g) - k * u * (u * g) = p * (u * g)".

In environment H4 : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q H0 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - p) (l - u * p) k, g, u, x : nat H : k * (u * g) <= x * g H5 : forall k : nat, k div u * g -> k div x * g -> k div g x0 : nat H1 : u * g = x0 * g x1 : nat H6 : forall k : nat, u * g div k -> x * g div k -> x1 * (x * g) div k x2 : nat H2 : x1 * (x * g) = x2 * (u * g) Unable to unify "u * g = x0 * g" with "u * g div x1 * (x * g) - k * u * (u * g)".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment H3 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q - p) (l - u * p) k, g, u, x1 : nat H : k * (u * g) <= x1 * g x, x0 : nat H4 : x * (x1 * g - k * (u * g)) = x0 * (u * g) H6 : forall k : nat, k div u * g -> k div x1 * g -> k div g x2 : nat H1 : u * g = x2 * g x3 : nat H7 : forall k : nat, u * g div k -> x1 * g div k -> x3 * (x1 * g) div k x4 : nat H2 : x3 * (x1 * g) = x4 * (u * g) H0 : forall p q g l u : nat, p <= q -> p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> p div l - u * p Unable to unify "exists p : nat, ?M7410 - ?M7411 * ?M7407 = p * ?M7407" with "exists p : nat, x * (x1 * g - k * (u * g)) = p * (x3 * (x1 * g) - k * u * (u * g))".
